allProducts.overview: A gentle retinol eye cream specifically formulated for the delicate eye area. Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and dark circles while being gentle enough for nightly use around sensitive eye skin.

allProducts.howTo:
Apply small amount around eye area in the evening
Gently tap with ring finger until absorbed
Start with 2-3 times per week, gradually increase frequency
